properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He ! matoky aho, Tompo,
Azoko ny teninao ;
Teny soa mahafaly,
Teny avy aminao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
He ! matoky aho, Tompo,
Azoko ny teninao ;
Teny soa mahafaly,
No omenao ahy izao

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tahotra aman'ahiahy
Dia iraiko izao ;
Fa nomenao toky aho
Sady to ny teninao.
He ! matoky aho, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Izay rehetra fahotana
Entiko hesorinao ;
Ianao no mahadio,
Ka diovy aho izao.
He ! matoky aho, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mahasasa, mahadio,
Mahavonjy Ianao,
Ka mandray sy mahatondra
Tsara ho an-tranona.
He ! matoky aho, sns.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jeso Tompo ! avy aho,
Avy hankalaza Anao ;
Raisonao re izay omeko :
Vola, tena, aina koa.
He ! matoky aho, sns.
